## Overview

The following dependencies have been updated:

- `yarn.lock` was updated
- `react` in `package.json` from "^15.5.4" to "^16.2.0"
- `react-dom` in `package.json` from "^15.5.4" to "^16.2.0"
- `react-scripts` in `package.json` from "^0.9.5" to "^1.0.17"

## Details

The following changes were made in the `yarn.lock` update:

| Type | Updated | Added | Removed |
|---|---|---|---|
| Direct | 5 | - | - |
| Transitive | 180 | 9 | 2 |

View the git diff for more details about exactly what changed.

---
